# GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionLocalizationAppPreviewSetsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionlocalizationapppreviewsetslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets#see-also)

### [Getting Information from a Localization](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersionLocalizations-_id_-relationships-appPreviewSets#Getting-Information-from-a-Localization)

[`List All App Preview Sets for an App Store Version Localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionlocalizations-_id_-apppreviewsets)List all app preview sets for a specific localization.[`List All App Screenshot Sets for an App Store Version Localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionlocalizations-_id_-appscreenshotsets)List all screenshot sets for a specific localization.[`GET /v1/appStoreVersionLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appScreenshotSets`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionlocalizations-_id_-relationships-appscreenshotsets)
